_NOTE: This file will be populated in Phase 2 after shots are rendered. It tracks which variation (A/B/C/D) is selected for each shot and the locations of rendered assets.

_INSTRUCTIONS.howToUse: After rendering shots in AI tools, place files in rendered/shots/{SHOT_ID}/ and update this file with selections
_INSTRUCTIONS.fileNaming: Use pattern: kling_option_A.mp4, kling_option_B.mp4, nano_first_frame.png, nano_last_frame.png
_INSTRUCTIONS.workflow: 1) Render shots, 2) Place in folders, 3) Update selections, 4) View in Storyboard UI, 5) Export for CapCut
